text: wan thi cea ca hen brrda phu sraththa chay læa brrda phu sraththa hying sængswang khxng phwk khea ca chay sæng n beuxnghna khxng phwk khea læa thang beuxng khwa khxng phwk khea (ca miseiyng klaw wa) wan ni mi khawdi kæ phwk cea khux swn swrrkh hlakhlay mi mæna hlay say hil phan n beuxng lang khxng man doy phanak xyu nı nan tlxd kal nan khux chaychna xan ying hıy
